description.@en: Inhaling deeply, you gurgle and belch forth vomitous detritus, consisting of spoiled milk, writhing maggots and pink slime.

criticalFailure.@en: The rancid pork burbles in your stomach and you are taken by shaking and sickness. You are immediately Incapacitated! and left Helpless for a number of minutes equal to your [WB]. You also suffer from Bloody Flux.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but your foes cannot Resist.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, any foes caught in its Cone Template suffer [[/roll 3D10]]+[WB] physical Peril and their wounds are instantly Infected. In addition, they must Resist with a successful Toughness Test or else they gain a permanent Chaos Rank.

reagents.@en: A sliver of rancid pork, consumed (expended)
